description: Inspects the text of a batch of documents for the syntax and part of speech of the words in the document and returns information about them. For more information, see Syntax in the Comprehend Developer Guide.

parameters.name: TextList
parameters.description: A list containing the UTF-8 encoded text of the input documents. The list can contain a maximum of 25 documents. The maximum size for each document is 5 KB. (string) ---

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description: The language of the input documents. You can specify any of the following languages supported by Amazon Comprehend: German ('de'), English ('en'), Spanish ('es'), French ('fr'), Italian ('it'), or Portuguese ('pt'). All documents must be in the same language.

nested_items.name: ResultList
nested_items.description: A list of objects containing the results of the operation. The results are sorted in ascending order by the Index field and match the order of the documents in the input list. If all of the documents contain an error, the ResultList is empty.

nested_items.name: Index
nested_items.description: The zero-based index of the document in the input list.

nested_items.name: SyntaxTokens
nested_items.description: The syntax tokens for the words in the document, one token for each word.

nested_items.name: TokenId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for a token.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The word that was recognized in the source text.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The zero-based offset from the beginning of the source text to the first character in the word.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The zero-based offset from the beginning of the source text to the last character in the word.

nested_items.name: PartOfSpeech
nested_items.description: Provides the part of speech label and the confidence level that Amazon Comprehend has that the part of speech was correctly identified. For more information, see Syntax in the Comprehend Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: Tag
nested_items.description: Identifies the part of speech that the token represents.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The confidence that Amazon Comprehend has that the part of speech was correctly identified.

nested_items.name: ErrorList
nested_items.description: A list containing one object for each document that contained an error. The results are sorted in ascending order by the Index field and match the order of the documents in the input list. If there are no errors in the batch, the ErrorList is empty.

nested_items.name: Index
nested_items.description: The zero-based index of the document in the input list.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The numeric error code of the error.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A text description of the error.
